rows.label: qev085707_MSG0001
rows.name: So guess what? They just posted that job![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085707_MSG0002
rows.name:
You should have seen Vandham's face when
I told him it was already done. Ha![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085707_MSG0003
rows.name: All according to plan, huh?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085707_MSG0004
rows.name: I told him half the reward goes to you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085707_MSG0005
rows.name: And they all lived happily ever after.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085707_MSG0006
rows.name: Mmm...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085707_MSG0007
rows.name: What? Are you still upset about those little whelps?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085707_MSG0008
rows.name: No, it's... I get it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085707_MSG0009
rows.name: We need that spot safe for developmental reasons.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085707_MSG0010
rows.name: Buuuut?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085707_MSG0011
rows.name: But after you...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085707_MSG0012
rows.name:
When it was over, you had this look on your face...
I could tell something was bothering you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085707_MSG0013
rows.name: Heh. Nothing gets past you, does it...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085707_MSG0014
rows.name: So you're making good on his debts?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085707_MSG0015
rows.name: Yep. Let's just say my old man knew how to live it up.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085707_MSG0016
rows.name:
He racked up a fortune in IOUs
before he suddenly kicked the bucket.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085707_MSG0017
rows.name:
I was hardly old enough to work when it happenedâ€”
could barely scrape by.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085707_MSG0018
rows.name: But surely you're under no obligation to pay his debts?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085707_MSG0019
rows.name: Not legally, no. But all those people were left hanging, so...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085707_MSG0020
rows.name: So you took on dangerous jobs.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085707_MSG0021
rows.name: High risk, high pay? I was your man.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085707_JNK0010
rows.name: Groan

rows.label: qev085707_SEL0011
rows.name: Tell Doug he has some serious issues.

rows.label: qev085707_JNK0020
rows.name: Approve

rows.label: qev085707_SEL0021
rows.name: Say it was a noble gesture on his part.

rows.label: qev085707_MSG0022
rows.name:
Man, you don't sugarcoat things, do ya?
Look, I KNOW it was crazy.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085707_MSG0023
rows.name: If you actually believe that, then you're as crazy as I am.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085707_MSG0024
rows.name: But wait, now all those people are...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085707_MSG0025
rows.name: Yep, gone, along with the rest of Earth...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085707_MSG0026
rows.name: Then why are you still doing it?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085707_MSG0027
rows.name:
Well, truth is...I'm saving up money to build them
a giant grave site. A memorial, I guess.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085707_MSG0028
rows.name: Bit morbid, I know.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085707_MSG0029
rows.name: Well, that's one way to put it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085707_MSG0030
rows.name: Anyway, that was a good day's work. Catch you all later.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085707_MSG0031
rows.name: ...Hey![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085707_MSG0032
rows.name: What is it, Linly?![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085707_MSG0033
rows.name: He didn't pay the bill for his coffee![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev085707_MSG0034
rows.name: Generous to a fault...emphasis on the fault.[ST:wait ]
